item.title: Need help with ints [pi]
item.dc:creator: @katiee katiee
item.description:
@katiee wrote:

ugh ok so i have an issue with ints,

so im not sure what type of ints my client has but heres an example

case 13887: itemDef.name = "Vesta's chainbody"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 42593; itemDef.modelZoom = 1440; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 545; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 5; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42624; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42644; itemDef.description = "Vesta's chainbody.".getBytes(); break;

i was just wondering how i would convert these ints to work on my client?
if someone could help me out by reposting it converted or giving me a converion chart of which is which that’d be great
